ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [eqbards] Cazic Thule AOF advice
ygData.msgSnippet: If you park your pet right under the bubble. You can have it pull the AoF by just sitting there, and it will eat the HT. ... [Non-text portions of this message
ygData.messageBody:
If you park your pet right under the bubble. You can have it pull the AoF by just sitting there, and it
will eat the HT.

blzkrg@... wrote:

> From: blzkrg@...
>
> > Heh. I think the preferred method of disposing of harm
> > touches is to have a pet eat it. In Mistmoore, I even managed
> > to get the cooks to harm touch each other once by charming one
> > to pull the room.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
>
> That is my preferred method usually, but it doesn't work on the AOF. You
> can target the AOF while he's in the bubble, but the /pet attack command
> doesn't do a thing. What usually happens is the mage tries to get closer
> thinking it's a range problem and they end up eating the HT. Easier, in
> this case, to have the warrior take it. :)
>
> Darkfox Reven'tsol
> Xegony
>
>
>
